name: IT Lab
description: IT Lab is an award-winning Technology and Managed Services Provider with more than 350 staff based in London, Manchester, Woking and Cape Town. We create individually tailored solutions for our clients, focused on their business objectives, not technical requirements. IT Lab provides solutions covering but not limited to IT support, user support, strategic consultancy, cloud consultancy, managed security and unified communications.

locations.address: 2nd Floor, The Annex Bridgeways Precinct 2 Energy Lane Century City Cape
